subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Stephan Shay’s run on Sunday in the New York City Marathon carried him past the place in Central Park where his brother Ryan had a fatal heart attack in 2007 during the Olympic trials.
snippet: Stephan Shay’s run on Sunday in the New York City Marathon carried him past the place in Central Park where his brother Ryan had a fatal heart attack in 2007 during the Olympic trials.
